message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your specific needs. With its exceptional features and capabilities, it's truly a game-changer in its field. Given its value and the benefits it offers, I believe it's worth more than what others might be willing to pay. Considering its worth to you, I propose a price of $10,500 for this product. This price reflects not only its intrinsic value but also the unique opportunity for you to secure such a high-quality item at a competitive rate. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can come to an agreement that benefits both of us.
